013    package net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
018    import java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject;
019    import java.lang.reflect.Field;
020    import java.lang.reflect.Method;
021    import java.util.Collection;
022    import java.util.List;
023    
024    import javax.persistence.Basic;
025    import javax.persistence.Column;
026    import javax.persistence.GeneratedValue;
027    import javax.persistence.Lob;
028    import javax.persistence.ManyToMany;
029    import javax.persistence.ManyToOne;
030    import javax.persistence.OneToMany;
031    import javax.persistence.OneToOne;
032    import javax.persistence.Version;
033    
034    import net.sf.oval.Check;
035    import net.sf.oval.configuration.Configurer;
036    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.ClassConfiguration;
037    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.ConstraintSetConfiguration;
038    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.FieldConfiguration;
039    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.MethodConfiguration;
040    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.MethodReturnValueConfiguration;
041    import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck;
042    import net.sf.oval.constraint.LengthCheck;
043    import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck;
044    import net.sf.oval.constraint.RangeCheck;
045    import net.sf.oval.internal.util.ReflectionUtils;
046    
047    /**
048     * Constraints configurer that interprets certain EJB3 JPA annotations:
049     * <ul>
050     * <li>javax.persistence.Basic(optional=false)     => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck
051     * <li>javax.persistence.OneToOne(optional=false)  => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck, net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck
052     * <li>javax.persistence.ManyToOne(optional=false) => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck, net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck
053     * <li>javax.persistence.ManyToMany                => net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck
054     * <li>javax.persistence.Column(nullable=false)    => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck
055     * <li>javax.persistence.Column(length=5)          => net.sf.oval.constraint.LengthCheck
056     * </ul>
057     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
058     */
059    public class JPAAnnotationsConfigurer implements Configurer
060    {
061            protected Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
062            protected Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
063    
064            /**
065             * @return the applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors
066             */
067            public Boolean getApplyFieldConstraintsToConstructors()
068            {
069                    return applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
070            }
071    
072            /**
073             * {@inheritDoc}
074             */
075            public ClassConfiguration getClassConfiguration(final Class< ? > clazz)
076            {
077                    final ClassConfiguration config = new ClassConfiguration();
078                    config.type = clazz;
079                    config.applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors = applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
080                    config.applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
081    
082                    /*
083                     * determine field checks
084                     */
085                    for (final Field field : config.type.getDeclaredFields())
086                    {
087                            final List<Check> checks = getCollectionFactory().createList(4);
088    
089                            // loop over all annotations of the current field
090                            for (final Annotation annotation : field.getAnnotations())
091                            {
092                                    if (annotation instanceof Basic)
093                                    {
094                                            initializeChecks((Basic) annotation, checks);
095                                    }
096                                    else if (annotation instanceof Column)
097                                    {
098                                            initializeChecks((Column) annotation, checks, field);
099                                    }
100                                    else if (annotation instanceof OneToOne)
101                                    {
102                                            initializeChecks((OneToOne) annotation, checks);
103                                    }
104                                    else if (annotation instanceof ManyToOne)
105                                    {
106                                            initializeChecks((ManyToOne) annotation, checks);
107                                    }
108                                    else if (annotation instanceof ManyToMany)
109                                    {
110                                            initializeChecks((ManyToMany) annotation, checks);
111                                    }
112                                    else if (annotation instanceof OneToMany)
113                                    {
114                                            initializeChecks((OneToMany) annotation, checks);
115                                    }
116                            }
117                            if (checks.size() > 0)
118                            {
119                                    if (config.fieldConfigurations == null)
120                                    {
121                                            config.fieldConfigurations = getCollectionFactory().createSet(8);
122                                    }
123    
124                                    final FieldConfiguration fc = new FieldConfiguration();
125                                    fc.name = field.getName();
126                                    fc.checks = checks;
127                                    config.fieldConfigurations.add(fc);
128                            }
129                    }
130    
131                    /*
132                     * determine getter checks
133                     */
134                    for (final Method method : config.type.getDeclaredMethods())
135                    {
136                            // consider getters only 
137                            if (!ReflectionUtils.isGetter(method))
138                            {
139                                    continue;
140                            }
141    
142                            final List<Check> checks = getCollectionFactory().createList(2);
143    
144                            // loop over all annotations
145                            for (final Annotation annotation : method.getAnnotations())
146                            {
147                                    if (annotation instanceof Basic)
148                                    {
149                                            initializeChecks((Basic) annotation, checks);
150                                    }
151                                    else if (annotation instanceof Column)
152                                    {
153                                            initializeChecks((Column) annotation, checks, method);
154                                    }
155                                    else if (annotation instanceof OneToOne)
156                                    {
157                                            initializeChecks((OneToOne) annotation, checks);
158                                    }
159                                    else if (annotation instanceof ManyToOne)
160                                    {
161                                            initializeChecks((ManyToOne) annotation, checks);
162                                    }
163                                    else if (annotation instanceof ManyToMany)
164                                    {
165                                            initializeChecks((ManyToMany) annotation, checks);
166                                    }
167                                    else if (annotation instanceof OneToMany)
168                                    {
169                                            initializeChecks((OneToMany) annotation, checks);
170                                    }
171                            }
172    
173                            // check if anything has been configured for this method at all
174                            if (checks.size() > 0)
175                            {
176                                    if (config.methodConfigurations == null)
177                                    {
178                                            config.methodConfigurations = getCollectionFactory().createSet(2);
179                                    }
180    
181                                    final MethodConfiguration mc = new MethodConfiguration();
182                                    mc.name = method.getName();
183                                    mc.isInvariant = true;
184                                    if (checks.size() > 0)
185                                    {
186                                            mc.returnValueConfiguration = new MethodReturnValueConfiguration();
187                                            mc.returnValueConfiguration.checks = checks;
188                                    }
189                                    config.methodConfigurations.add(mc);
190                            }
191                    }
192                    return config;
193            }
194    
195            /**
196             * {@inheritDoc}
197             */
198            public ConstraintSetConfiguration getConstraintSetConfiguration(final String constraintSetId)
199            {
200                    return null;
201            }
202    
203            protected void initializeChecks(final Basic annotation, final Collection<Check> checks)
204            {
205                    assert annotation != null;
206                    assert checks != null;
207    
208                    if (!annotation.optional())
209                    {
210                            checks.add(new NotNullCheck());
211                    }
212            }
213    
214            protected void initializeChecks(final Column annotation, final Collection<Check> checks,
215                            final AccessibleObject fieldOrMethod)
216            {
217                    assert annotation != null;
218                    assert checks != null;
219    
220                    /* If the value is generated (annotated with @GeneratedValue) it is allowed to be null 
221                     * before the entity has been persisted, same is true in case of optimistic locking
222                     * when a field is annotated with @Version.
223                     * Therefore and because of the fact that there is no generic way to determine if an entity 
224                     * has been persisted already, a not-null check will not be performed for such fields. 
225                     */
226                    if (!annotation.nullable() && !fieldOrMethod.isAnnotationPresent(GeneratedValue.class)
227                                    && !fieldOrMethod.isAnnotationPresent(Version.class))
228                    {
229                            checks.add(new NotNullCheck());
230                    }
231    
232                    // only consider length parameter if @Lob is not present
233                    if (!fieldOrMethod.isAnnotationPresent(Lob.class))
234                    {
235                            final LengthCheck lengthCheck = new LengthCheck();
236                            lengthCheck.setMax(annotation.length());
237                            checks.add(lengthCheck);
238                    }
239    
240                    // only consider precision/scale for numeric fields
241                    if (annotation.precision() > 0
242                                    && Number.class.isAssignableFrom(fieldOrMethod instanceof Field ? ((Field) fieldOrMethod).getType()
243                                                    : ((Method) fieldOrMethod).getReturnType()))
244                    {
245                            /*
246                             * precision = 6, scale = 2  => -9999.99<=x<=9999.99
247                             * precision = 4, scale = 1  =>   -999.9<=x<=999.9
248                             */
249                            final RangeCheck rangeCheck = new RangeCheck();
250                            rangeCheck.setMax(Math.pow(10, annotation.precision() - annotation.scale())
251                                            - Math.pow(0.1, annotation.scale()));
252                            rangeCheck.setMin(-1 * rangeCheck.getMax());
253                            checks.add(rangeCheck);
254                    }
255            }
256    
257            protected void initializeChecks(final ManyToMany annotation, final Collection<Check> checks)
258            {
259                    assert annotation != null;
260                    assert checks != null;
261    
262                    checks.add(new AssertValidCheck());
263            }
264    
265            protected void initializeChecks(final ManyToOne annotation, final Collection<Check> checks)
266            {
267                    assert annotation != null;
268                    assert checks != null;
269    
270                    if (!annotation.optional())
271                    {
272                            checks.add(new NotNullCheck());
273                    }
274                    checks.add(new AssertValidCheck());
275            }
276    
277            protected void initializeChecks(final OneToMany annotation, final Collection<Check> checks)
278            {
279                    assert annotation != null;
280                    assert checks != null;
281    
282                    checks.add(new AssertValidCheck());
283            }
284    
285            protected void initializeChecks(final OneToOne annotation, final Collection<Check> checks)
286            {
287                    assert annotation != null;
288                    assert checks != null;
289    
290                    if (!annotation.optional())
291                    {
292                            checks.add(new NotNullCheck());
293                    }
294                    checks.add(new AssertValidCheck());
295            }
296    
297            /**
298             * @return the applyFieldConstraintsToSetter
299             */
300            public Boolean isApplyFieldConstraintsToSetter()
301            {
302                    return applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
303            }
304    
305            /**
306             * @param applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors the applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors to set
307             */
308            public void setApplyFieldConstraintsToConstructors(final Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors)
309            {
310                    this.applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors = applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
311            }
312    
313            /**
314             * @param applyFieldConstraintsToSetters the applyFieldConstraintsToSetter to set
315             */
316            public void setApplyFieldConstraintsToSetters(final Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters)
317            {
318                    this.applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
319            }
320    
321    }
